website_summaries.verdict: The Columbia Fairbanks Low is a low-top hiking shoe that manages to captivate the crowd with its comfortable feel and lightweight construction. Consumers are also glad with its zero break-in period, breathability, and traction.However, the footgear’s default laces are a cause of concern with its long length. To sum up, the Fairbanks Low from Columbia offers a lot of benefits that may come in handy during a summer excursion.
pros: A number of buyers applaud the Columbia Fairbanks Low’s level of comfort
A majority of shoppers are happy with the lightness of this quality hiking shoe
Its breathability is top-notch, as testified by many adventurers
Several shoppers affirm the outsole’s grip on slippery terrain
A couple of purchasers appreciate the Fairbanks Low’s arch support
According to a few buyers, it virtually had no break-in period
cons: A bunch of outdoor enthusiasts lament the long laces of this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Soooo nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes about 3-4 days, and I already love them. The arch support is perfect. There's enough give to them when walking that even when I'm walking at a fair pace, it doesn't feel like I'm slapping my feet on the pavement. The toe-box is surprisingly roomy, and the width is perfect, which is touch for me since I have relatively wide feet. I'm curious how durable the sole will be and how long it will last since it seems a bit soft, but as of now, I've no complaints and only compliments!
customer_reviews.author: SHK

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first shoes made by Columbia that I have ever owned. Columbia makes some of the highest quality outdoor clothing and products in the industry and these shoes are no exception. Right out of the box, I could tell they were a high-quality pair of footwear. I put them on and didn't want to tal]ke them off! They are super comfortable and are still comfortable after wearing them all day. I ordered the black pair and have been wearing them as sort of a "dress" type of shoe, so I just ordered the gray ones to be my everyday type of shoe. Again, I cannot stress how comfortable and well made these shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Depends what you want them for
customer_reviews.text: I like the materials of the shoe. It's comfortable and breathable. For me the traction is an issue though. I've slipped every time I've needed good traction. Mainly while pushing heavy things on smooth concrete, while climbing through gravel and while climbing up or down rocks. The shoe also has weak structure. The bottom of the shoe easily slips to the sides of my feet which creates unpredictable movement. The shoe overall isn't bad and it looks and feels nice however, it isn't what I need.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Compliments Galore
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband. He gets constant compliments on them. Comfortable and look great on. Bonus, if you are a Seattle football fan... the blue w/green piping will look very familiar and probably match your wardrobe 😉
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and find them super comfortable and great arch support. I have a narrow foot and find they fit well and look stylish enough as well for when I am in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great for small hikes and light walks ** NOT FOR RUNING**
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes for camping, small hikes and light terrain walks. Going on nature trails was easy! Nice grip on the sides and light weight. I had no issues of slippage. Last night, I decided to go for a jog in them because I love how they fit. Half-way down my trail, I came to realizes how lack of cushion when my feet impact the ground. Overall, Great shoe for everything except running, jogging or anything that requires ground impact.
customer_reviews.author: J Day

customer_reviews.title: Okay until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a nice looking shoe with traction at a good price, until less than 3 months in we had separation. It would be nice to get a year out of a pair of sneakers, not 3 months. The warranty process is silly, I have to clean them and then ship them at my expense, wait 4-6 weeks and then get a credit towards buying new sneakers at full prices. Not happening, removing Columbia from my buying in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant, grate grip !
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely picky when it comes to fit of shoes and I took a gamble with ordering these he tried them on and was pleasantly surprised . He also went golfing in them and his feet did not get wet and had no slipping problems on the morning due grass . These are a big time favorite.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Stupid comfy and love the look. Been wearing them daily for about 2 weeks and they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Wowza
customer_reviews.text: Wowza these things are supportive and cunfy at the same time. My feet sweat so the breathability is huge with these. Overall very nice shoes. Highly recommend so far. Columbia shoes seem to last. Very sharp. Wife hates most my shoes and can stomach these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!  Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shoes I've had in a long while. It's super comfortable. Very light weight. It's like I'm just wearing sturdier socks with rubber soles almost. They fit so perfectly. They aren't waterproof. So they get wet easily, but otherwise I love them. I'm thinking of getting another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good looking lightweight walking shoes. Fit is spot on, I wear a 9d in most shoes and boots, these 9 fit right on. Comfortable right out of the box. Breathable for summer walking. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: agent89

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable right out of the box and no need for any break in period. Like the extra room in the toe box, very light and colors are great. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and it's hard to find a shoe that fits right. These shoes fit perfect! They're very comfortable and flexible. Not to heavy but enough weight to let you know it's quality material. I will update after I use them for work
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Comfy right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wear a 10, 10 fit just right. Was comfortable right out of the box without any breaking in. Great for light hiking (not waterproof), daily wear, or trekking around downtown.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing after time.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and good looking but after 2 months of wear the seams are starting to protrude in uncomfortable places on the side of my foot. Disappointed because I really liked them put of the box.
customer_reviews.author: E Rock

customer_reviews.title: Fit is true to size
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my husband. I ordered a size 9, and we are happy to report that the fit is perfect, and they are super comfortable. VERY happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust is most important for me!
customer_reviews.text: Item is used not brand new as it should be. It is used and even have sings of ware from inside and outside, seems it was cleaned but dirt is still there. Very disappointing!!! Never experienced something like this with Amazon!!! When I buy item I should know it is brand new or used to make a decision, physically I don'r see item when buying so trust is most important for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikheil Saralishvili

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look great, they are supportive and comfortable. they also provided excellent traction in the dirt, pavement and going up some nice size boulders on the trails. Fit me true to size
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These have been some of the best shoes I've had. Very comfortable and I get a lot of complements on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Subaru of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these shoes. I had him try them on while he was sitting for a few and he never took them back off. He was skeptical when he first took them out of the box, mentioned that they looked like the Subaru of shoes (they do!) and then said he loved them! They are lightweight and comfortable and the color combo is nice and pairs well with just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: heather Francis

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes larger!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 14 for my son, and he usually wears 13, and it's STILL too small! Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE SEATON

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable shoes. They MIGHT be a tad tight, but they are a great durable and comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dang sweet kicks.
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are great. Ran a smidge bigger in the toe box but I would rather it be a little big than too small. Great design, great traction, and they seem pretty tough. Time will tell though.
customer_reviews.author: Donkey Face

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: 20 y/o loves the shoes. He says they fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very rigid heel gave me blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Gave me the WORST blisters on first use. The back of the heel is very rigid and rubbed my heels raw. To be fair, I was not wearing very long socks. The shoes themselves look great and seem to be quality made. May have just been a bad fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoes. build quality like most shoe manufacturers. Expecting to get 1-2 years
customer_reviews.author: ITguy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. We bought a pair in every color. They fit great. Look stylish yet minimalist. He used to only wear Merrells but likes the way these fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of footwear from Columia. Very comfortable, wide toed shoes! Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort ,fits and look great
customer_reviews.text: This the most comfortable and best shoes i ever bought fit my feet perfectly, and great room for your toes,at a great prize ill recomend this for anyone who's looking for a comfort shoes.
customer_reviews.author: keith w.

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY THEM ALREADY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Delivery was on time. You can loosen up the laces to the width of your liking. Very comfortable. Will be buying again if these ever crap out. Which I’m sure they will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brett sauskojus

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few months and they are awesome. I recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are excellent. I knew they'd fit as expected being i always use Columbia and I'm more than pleased with these. Only wish is that they are waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: These shoes slap
customer_reviews.text: These are literally just the best shoes ever. I’m a woman and I’m a size 9 and I got a 7.5 in these and they’re just the beans. They held up super well and I pick them out of my huge line up of shoes almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smelled horrible!!!1
customer_reviews.text: New shoes, smelled horrible with an industrial smell. too bad my partner threw out the box before I could return it. now I am stuck with new shoes that I left out in the sun for 3 days. No change in smell.Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for those who work outdoors. Very light and comfortable. A good combination of boot traction and stability with active shoe styling and breathability. I wore a pair of Columbia boots to work for 4 years before they gave out. Hopefully these last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Turkins

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are amazing would definitely buy and tell friends Cannot wait on our camping trip yay
customer_reviews.author: Krystal miller

customer_reviews.title: The size 14 its in realy 13
customer_reviews.text: the shoes is too smal for the size consider to take 1 size biger
customer_reviews.author: Levan Beruchashvili

customer_reviews.title: Columbia shoes are the sh#t🤙
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled em out the box walked 5 blocks very comfortable so far, quality material👍, only thing shoes much darker than advertised pic( filters Bad)👎, ordered on Sat. arrived on Tue. Cool🤙
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn. I purchased them to wear on a Disney World trip. They far exceeded my expectations and I plan on purchasing more pairs in the future
customer_reviews.author: jeremy skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and they are lightweight. They are trail shoes but are comfortable for daily use and running errands. I'm thinking about grabbing another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moody

customer_reviews.title: Shoes met expectation
customer_reviews.text: Been using these shoes for a week or so. Good fit. Comfortable. Just wish they vented a little better, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. Taken a beating so far (3months)
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m really happy. I stand all day in these, they fit well. There isn’t much sole/cushion to them. Might be a good idea to buy a sole insert.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and lightweight. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the arch support and sleek design. Sole is exceptionally grippy.
customer_reviews.author: AndreyKG ShmelevKG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for being on your feet for long periods.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for long days at work on concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. James

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: It fits a little different than what I'm used to. Very rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better pair of shoes. They look awesome, good for high arches, and have great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a casual hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit as expected. They were comfortable at first wear without need of breaking in and have great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort! Style!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out the box. looks great. Very happy with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Ciren

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Fairbanks Low Sneaker
product_meta.description: Up your street style game with a sneaker that has a seriously versatile look and wear-all-day-long comfort.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper with suede heel cap and webbing eyelets
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
